pages.title: Blood Orchid Petals
pages.text: These leaves seem to belong to a flower you don't know. Did it once bloom here? Was it grown by those who came before you? Perhaps a souvenir from a world you have never entered yourself? Yet it looks like it was plucked just five minutes ago.$(br)You feel something whenever you touch the petal: $(italic)restlessness$().

pages.title: Blood Orchid Plants
pages.text: $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal#resonant_lily)Resonant Lilies$(/l)! Truly an elusive flower - and seemingly related to Blood Orchids. Though the Blood Orchid's energy very quickly takes over.$(br)Welp, worst thing that can happen is you ending up with another plant that you can pluck petals off of.
